projects.project_name: Earth road reparing and pipe culvert construction

ProjectSummary.Objective: In the future, people living in the commune will have comfortable roads for traveling and transporting agricultural products in the commune

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project required land acquisition report.Voluntary
Land_Safeguard.Reason: The concerned families voluntarily grant their parts of lands (lesser than 5%) and properties on the lands to the project

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: These villages are not in the watched list of HP
